attributes.action: Ban the slaughter of animals by having their throats cut.
attributes.additional_details: This is a horrific way to kill animals. They should be killed instantly. I believe the public would be horrified if they knew of it.
attributes.background: The majority of slaughterhouses kill animals using the Hallal method so that the meat can be sold as Hallal. This entails stringing up animals while still alive and letting them bleed out. This must be banned.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban the non-stun slaughter of animals
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729708
